org.artoolkitx.arx.arxj.camera

Interface CameraEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CameraEventListenerImpl

    public interface CameraEventListener
    The CameraEventListener interface allows an observer to respond to events from a FrameListener.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cameraStreamFrame(byte[] frame, int frameSize)
      Called when the camera preview has a new frame ready.
      void cameraStreamFrame(java.nio.ByteBuffer[] framePlanes, int[] framePlanePixelStrides, int[] framePlaneRowStrides)
      Called when the camera preview has a new frame ready.
      void cameraStreamStarted(int width, int height, java.lang.String pixelFormat, int cameraIndex, boolean cameraIsFrontFacing)
      Called when the camera preview is started.
      void cameraStreamStopped()
      Called when the capture preview is stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • cameraStreamStarted

        void cameraStreamStarted(int width,
                         int height,
                         java.lang.String pixelFormat,
                         int cameraIndex,
                         boolean cameraIsFrontFacing)
        Called when the camera preview is started. The video dimensions and frame rate are passed through, along with information about the camera.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the video image in pixels.
        height - The height of the video image in pixels.
        pixelFormat - A string with format in which buffers will be pushed. Supported values include "NV21", "NV12", "YUV_420_888", "RGBA", "RGB_565", and "MONO".
        cameraIndex - Zero-based index of the camera in use. If only one camera is present, will be 0.
        cameraIsFrontFacing - false if camera is rear-facing (the default) or true if camera is facing toward the user.

      • cameraStreamFrame

        void cameraStreamFrame(byte[] frame,
                       int frameSize)
        Called when the camera preview has a new frame ready.
        Parameters:
        frame - A byte array from the camera, in the camera's capture format.

      • cameraStreamFrame

        void cameraStreamFrame(java.nio.ByteBuffer[] framePlanes,
                       int[] framePlanePixelStrides,
                       int[] framePlaneRowStrides)
        Called when the camera preview has a new frame ready.
        Parameters:
        framePlanes - An array of ByteBuffers from the camera's frame planes, in the camera's capture format.

      • cameraStreamStopped

        void cameraStreamStopped()
        Called when the capture preview is stopped. No new frames will be sent.
